pr_title: Fix the dark mode and switch the syntax highlighter from highlight.js to prism.js

timeline.message: feat: Switched from highlight.js to prism.js and fixed the dark mode

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                keyword: /\b(?:syntax|rule|Id|Int|Bool|String|configuration|imports|require|Token|Lexer|Float|requires|Kresult|context|module|endmodule)\b/,
          
          
            
                keyword: /\b(?:syntax|syntax lexical|syntax priorities|rule|Id|Int|Bool|String|configuration|imports|require|Token|Lexer|Float|requires|Kresult|context|module|endmodule)\b/,
          
      
    
    
  

You need to inspect the bison outer parser for all the keywords (do find ./ -name Outer.jj in the K repo).
timeline.author: ehildenb
